page.title: 12Fishing & Badminton Onecote
page.content:
The fishing season lasts from April until October. In Onecote, Rainbow Trout and Brown Trout can be caught in the River Hamps. Fly fishing is the main and best method for catching trout but younger fishermen would rather use maggots. The fishing places in Onecote are mainly private and can only be used with the farmer's permission.
The children in Onecote often get together to enjoy themselves.
Badminton is one game that the children of Onecote play on a fine day. Each person takes a racket and a shuttle cock along to the old school playground. A net is provided.
